select.if: SELECT T.ID AS "id",'-1' AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'true' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.ORGLEVEL = '1'
SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'true' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}
SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'false' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}

mapper.delete: DELETE PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MAG_PERSON T WHERE T.DEAL_DATE=#{chooseMonth} AND T.HR_ID=#{hr_id} AND T.USER_TYPE=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MAG_PERSON SELECT T3.ID,T3.REALNAME,T3.USERNAME,T3.PHONE,'',1,T6.UNIT_ID,T6.GROUP_ID_1,T6.HQ_CHAN_CODE,T6.UNIT_NAME,T6.GROUP_ID_1_NAME, SYSDATE,'','绑定',1,T6.GROUP_ID_4_NAME,'','',T3.HR_ID,'','',TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'',1,#{chooseMonth} FROM PORTAL.APDP_USER T3 JOIN PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T6 ON (#{hq_chan_code}=T6.HQ_CHAN_CODE) WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MAG_PERSON T7 WHERE #{hr_id}=T7.HR_ID AND T7.USER_TYPE=1 AND T7.DEAL_DATE=#{chooseMonth}) AND T3.HR_ID=#{hr_id}

select.if: SELECT T.GROUP_ID_4_NAME FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T WHERE T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code}
SELECT T.GROUP_ID_4_NAME FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T WHERE T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code} AND T.GROUP_ID_1=#{code}

mapper.update: UPDATE PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MAG_PERSON T SET T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code} WHERE T.DEAL_DATE=#{chooseMonth} AND T.HR_ID=#{hr_id} AND T.USER_TYPE=1

MERGE INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MAG_PERSON T USING PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T1 ON (T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=T1.HQ_CHAN_CODE) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.HQ_CHAN_NAME=T1.GROUP_ID_4_NAME WHERE T.DEAL_DATE=#{chooseMonth} AND T.HR_ID=#{hr_id} AND T.USER_TYPE=1 AND T1.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code}
